name: This Cozy Garden
description:
This Cozy Garden

Grow flowers and expand your garden on a rainy day 🌧️

There's no particular goal other than to relax and grow some flowers. I would recommend downloading the game for the best experience.

I hope you enjoy this small game! Feel free to follow me over on Twitter for future development updates.

------------------------

Controls Keyboard/Mouse
ActionWASD (Keys)Move CameraMouse Scroll WheelZoom Camera1,2,3,4Select Item.
1: Hoe 2: Blue Seed 3: Yellow Seed 4: Pink SeedClick Tile (Left Mouse Button)Use Item on tileEscape Key (Esc)Pause GameR (Key)Prompt to reset gardenSpacebar
Enter ground tile placing mode
Expand Garden

If you wish, you can gather extra ground tiles that you can place to expand your garden. 

You can gather these tiles by growing any of the flowers that appear on the top right of the screen.

Once these flowers are grown and you have gathered that ground tile, you can still remove that flower without any repercussions.
